protein.specific_function: Works in concert with the 5-alpha/5-beta-steroid reductases to convert steroid hormones into the 3-alpha/5-alpha and 3-alpha/5-beta-tetrahydrosteroids. Catalyzes the inactivation of the most potent androgen 5-alpha-dihydrotestosterone (5-alpha-DHT) to 5-alpha-androstane-3-alpha,17-beta-diol (3-alpha-diol). Has a high bile-binding ability.

pathway.name: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on NADH or NADPH, quinone or similar compound as acceptor
cellular response to jasmonic acid stimulus
positive regulation of protein kinase B signaling cascade
